thread.title: BAFTA 2017: Complete List of Winners | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: BAFTA 2017: Complete List of Winners | Hollywood Reporter

title: BAFTA 2017: Complete List of Winners | Hollywood Reporter
text:
10:45 AM 2/12/2017 by Alex Ritman 'La La Land' has 11 nominations, while 'Arrival' and 'Nocturnal Animals' follow behind with nine each. Courtesy of Venice Film Festival 
With exactly two weeks to go until the Oscars, it's time for the biggest film awards outside of the U.S., the BAFTAs. 
The awards show on Sunday evening took place at London's Royal Albert Hall, with Stephen Fry on hosting duties again. 
La La Land went in leading the pack of films with 11 nominations, followed by Arrival and Nocturnal Animals with nine each. Manchester By The Sea has six, while the British contingent was led by I, Daniel Blake , Lion , Florence Foster Jenkins and Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them , with four. Moonlight and Hacksaw Ridge also earned four. 
See the list of winners below. THR will be updating the list as the night goes on. Documentary
